title: Augusta County: T. W. Alexander, A. R. Wright, J. A. Stewart, T. S. Price, D. Scott, J. A. Johnson, Committee to Alexander H. H. Stuart, February 11, 1868
summary: The conservatives of Floyd County, Georgia, invite Alexander H. H. Stuart to attend a celebration of Washington's birthday to take place in Rome, Floyd County, Georgia.
keywords: African Americans, Military Authority, National Government, Patriotism, Race Relations, American Civil War
